name: ORC Balance Amount
script:
orc = doc.orc_id
j_amount = 0
b_amount = 0
if frappe.db.exists({"doctype": "ORC List", "name": doc.orc_id}):
    if frappe.db.exists({"doctype": "Journal Entry", "orc_id": doc.orc_id}):
        # frappe.msgprint(orc)
        je_data = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT total_debit FROM `tabJournal Entry` tje where tje.orc_id = '{orc}' ;""", as_dict=1)
        for each in je_data:
            j_amount = j_amount + each.total_debit
        
        data = frappe.get_doc('ORC List', orc)
        orc_data = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT sub_total FROM `tabORC List` tol where tol.name= '{orc}' ;""", as_dict=1)
        b_amount = orc_data[0].sub_total - j_amount
        data.balance_amount = b_amount
        data.save()

name: Sales Invoice to Renewal
script:
invoice_num = doc.name
user = ""
team_name= ""
#frappe.msgprint(doc.customer_name)

if doc.sales_team.length != 0:
    user = doc.sales_team[0].sales_person
    team_name = doc.sales_team[0].team_name


    
for d in doc.items:
    frappe.msgprint(d.item_name)
     
    if d.newadd == "Renewal":
       
        if frappe.db.exists({"doctype": "Renewal List", "customer_name": doc.customer_name, "product_name": d.item_name, "status":"Active"}):
            frappe.msgprint(doc.customer_name)
            status_item = "Active"
            name_field = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT name FROM `tabRenewal List` WHERE status='{status_item}'AND product_name='{d.item_name}' AND customer_name='{doc.customer_name}'  ;""",as_dict=0)
            
            
            old_data = frappe.get_doc('Renewal List',name_field[0][0])
            
            old_data.status = "Renewed"
            old_data.save()
            renewal_option = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT renewal_option FROM `tabItem` WHERE  name='{d.item_code}'  ;""")
        
            
            contact_status = "Open"
            contact_data = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT name FROM `tabContact` WHERE  company_name='{doc.customer_name}' AND status='{contact_status}'  ;""")
            
            
            sales_team = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT sales_person, team_name, account_manager FROM `tabCustomer` WHERE  customer_name='{doc.customer_name}'  ;""")
            frappe.msgprint(sales_team[0][0])
            frappe.msgprint(sales_team[0][1])
            if renewal_option:
                frappe.msgprint(renewal_option[0][0])
            
                if renewal_option[0][0] == "Yes":
                    data = frappe.get_doc({
                        'doctype': 'Renewal List',
                        'product_name':d.item_code,
                        'status':"Active",
                        'invoice_no':invoice_num,
                        'end_date':d.end_date,
                        'total_quantity':d.qty,
                        'total_amount':d.amount,
                        'start_date':d.start_date,
                        'customer_name':doc.customer,
                        'sales_user' : user,
                        'sales_team' : team_name,
                        'renewal_owner':sales_team[0][2]
                        
                        
                    })
                    frappe.msgprint(d.item_code)
                    
                    data.append("items",{
                        'item_code' : d.item_code,
                        'qty': d.qty,
                        'start_date':d.start_date,
                        'end_date':d.end_date,
                        'rate':d.rate,
                        'new_add':d.newadd,
                        'amount':d.amount,
                        'uom':d.uom,
                        'description':d.description,
                        'item_name': d.item_name,
                        'invoice_no':invoice_num,
                        'conversion_factor':d.conversion_factor
                    })
                    
                    
                    
                    for each in doc.contact_list:
                    
                        data.append("contact_list",{
                            'user_name' : each.user_name,
                            'mobile_no': each.mobile_no,
                            'email_id':each.email_id,
                            'designation':each.designation
                            
                        })
                        
                    data.insert()    
        
        
        else:
            frappe.throw(f"Renewal item {d.item_name} is not available")            
    
    
    if d.newadd == "Additional":
        if frappe.db.exists({"doctype": "Renewal List", "customer_name": doc.customer_name, "product_name": d.item_name, "status":"Active"}):
            frappe.msgprint(doc.customer_name)
            
            status_item = "Active"
            name_field = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT name FROM `tabRenewal List` WHERE status='{status_item}' AND product_name='{d.item_name}' AND customer_name='{doc.customer_name}'  ;""")
            
            frappe.msgprint(name_field[0][0])
            old_data = frappe.get_doc('Renewal List',name_field[0][0])
            # frappe.msgprint(old_data)
            old_data.status = "Active"
            old_data.total_amount = int(old_data.total_amount) + int(d.amount)
            old_data.total_quantity = int(old_data.total_quantity) + int(d.qty)
            
            old_data.append("items",{
                'item_code' : d.item_code,
                'qty': d.qty,
                'start_date':d.start_date,
                'end_date':d.end_date,
                'rate':d.rate,
                'new_add':d.newadd,
                'amount':d.amount,
                'uom':d.uom,
                'cost_center':d.cost_center,
                'description':d.description,
                'item_name': d.item_name,
                'invoice_no':doc.name,
                'conversion_factor':d.conversion_factor
            })
            frappe.msgprint("Successfully entered Renewal")
            #old_data.insert()
            old_data.save()
            
        else:
            frappe.throw(f"Please check line item {d.item_name}")  
            
    if d.newadd == "New":
        
        renewal_option = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT renewal_option FROM `tabItem` WHERE  name='{d.item_code}'  ;""")
        
        #frappe.msgprint(renewal_option[0])
        contact_status = "Open"
        contact_data = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT name FROM `tabContact` WHERE  company_name='{doc.customer_name}' AND status='{contact_status}'  ;""")
        # frappe.msgprint(len(contact_data))
        
        sales_team = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT sales_person, team_name,account_manager FROM `tabCustomer` WHERE  customer_name='{doc.customer_name}'  ;""")
        #frappe.msgprint(sales_team[0][0])
        #frappe.msgprint(sales_team[0][1])
        if renewal_option:
            #frappe.msgprint(renewal_option[0][0])
        
            if renewal_option[0][0] == "Yes":
                
                
                data = frappe.get_doc({
                    'doctype': 'Renewal List',
                    'product_name':d.item_name,
                    'status':"Active",
                    'invoice_no':invoice_num,
                    'end_date':d.end_date,
                    'total_quantity':d.qty,
                    'total_amount':d.amount,
                    'start_date':d.start_date,
                    'customer_name':doc.customer,
                    'sales_user' : user,
                    'sales_team' : team_name,
                    'renewal_owner':sales_team[0][2]
                    
                    
                })
                
                    
                #frappe.msgprint(d.item_code)
                
                data.append("items",{
                    'item_code' : d.item_code,
                    'qty': d.qty,
                    'start_date':d.start_date,
                    'end_date':d.end_date,
                    'rate':d.rate,
                    'new_add':d.newadd,
                    'amount':d.amount,
                    'uom':d.uom,
                    'description':d.description,
                    'item_name': d.item_name,
                    'invoice_no':invoice_num,
                    'conversion_factor':d.conversion_factor,
                    'managed_services':d.managed_services
                })
                
                for each in doc.contact_list:
                    
                    data.append("contact_list",{
                        'user_name' : each.user_name,
                        'mobile_no': each.mobile_no,
                        'email_id':each.email_id,
                        'designation':each.designation,
                        
                    })
                    
                    frappe.msgprint("Successfully entered Renewal")
               
                
                
                data.insert() 
        
        else:
            frappe.msgprint("This product has no subscription")

name: Invoice to Renewal
script:
invoice_num = doc.name
user = ""
lead_name= ""
# frappe.msgprint(doc.customer_name)

if doc.sales_team.length == 0:
    frappe.msgprint("Please Add Sales Team Details")
else:
    user = doc.sales_team[0].sales_person
    lead_name = doc.sales_team[0].team_name
    


if doc.is_return == 0:
    for d in doc.items:
        # frappe.msgprint(d.newadd)
         
        if d.newadd == "Renewal" :
            # frappe.msgprint("hello!!!!")
            if d.renewal_id != " ":
                old_data = frappe.get_doc('Renewal List',d.renewal_id)
                #frappe.msgprint("hello hi hi")
                
                old_data.status = "Renewed"
                old_data.save()
                renewal_option = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT renewal_option FROM `tabItem` WHERE  name='{d.item_code}'  ;""")
                
                #frappe.msgprint(renewal_option[0])
                contact_status = "Open"
                # contact_data = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT name FROM `tabContact` WHERE  company_name='{doc.customer_name}' AND status='{contact_status}'  ;""")
                # frappe.msgprint(len(contact_status))
                
                sales_team = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT sales_person, team_name, account_manager FROM `tabCustomer` WHERE  customer_name="{doc.customer_name}"  ;""")
                # frappe.msgprint(sales_team[0][0])
                #frappe.msgprint(sales_team[0][1])
                if renewal_option:
                    # frappe.msgprint(renewal_option[0][0])
            
                    if renewal_option[0][0] == "Yes":
                        data = frappe.get_doc({
                            'doctype': 'Renewal List',
                            'product_name':d.item_name,
                            'status':"Draft",
                            'invoice_no':invoice_num,
                            'renewal_attachment':d.renewal_attachment,
                            'end_date':d.end_date,
                            'total_quantity':d.qty,
                            'total_amount':doc.grand_total,
                            'start_date':d.start_date,
                            'customer_name':doc.customer,
                            'sales_user' : user,
                            'domain_name':old_data.domain_name,
                            'sales_team' : sales_team[0][1],
                            'renewal_owner':sales_team[0][2]
                            
                            
                        })
                        # frappe.msgprint(d.item_code)
                        
                        data.append("items",{
                            'item_code' : d.item_code,
                            'qty': d.qty,
                            'start_date':d.start_date,
                            'end_date':d.end_date,
                            'rate':d.rate,
                            'new_add':d.newadd,
                            'amount':d.amount,
                            'uom':d.uom,
                            'description':d.description,
                            'item_name': d.item_name,
                            'item_group':d.item_group,
                            'renewal_id': d.renewal_id,
                            'brand':d.brand,
                            'invoice_no':invoice_num,
                            'conversion_factor':d.conversion_factor
                        })
                        
                        #frappe.msgprint("auto-entered")
                        
                       
                        
                        if doc.contact_list:
                            for each in doc.contact_list:
                        
                                data.append("contact_list",{
                                    'user_name' : each.user_name,
                                    'mobile_no': each.mobile_no,
                                    'email_id':each.email_id,
                                    'designation':each.designation
                                    
                                })
                        else:
                            frappe.throw("Please add contact details")
                            
                            
                        data.insert()    
                
            else:
                frappe.throw(f"Please check Renewal ID")
           
        if d.newadd == "Additional" :
            if d.renewal_id != " ":
                #frappe.msgprint(name_field[0][0])
                old_data = frappe.get_doc('Renewal List',d.renewal_id)
                # frappe.msgprint(old_data)
                old_data.status = "Active"
                old_data.total_amount = int(old_data.total_amount) + int(d.amount)
                old_data.total_quantity = int(old_data.total_quantity) + int(d.qty)
                
                old_data.append("items",{
                    'item_code' : d.item_code,
                    'qty': d.qty,
                    'start_date':d.start_date,
                    'end_date':d.end_date,
                    'rate':d.rate,
                    'new_add':d.newadd,
                    'amount':d.amount,
                    'uom':d.uom,
                    'cost_center':d.cost_center,
                    'description':d.description,
                    'item_name': d.item_name,
                    'item_group':d.item_group,
                    'brand':d.brand,
                    'invoice_no':doc.name,
                    'conversion_factor':d.conversion_factor
                })
                #old_data.insert()
                old_data.save()
            
            else:
                frappe.throw(f"Please check Renewal ID")
        
        if d.newadd == "New":
            
            renewal_option = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT renewal_option FROM `tabItem` WHERE  name='{d.item_code}'  ;""")
            
            # frappe.msgprint(renewal_option[0][0])
            contact_status = "Open"
            # contact_data = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT name FROM `tabContact` WHERE  company_name='{doc.customer_name}' AND status='{contact_status}'  ;""")
            # frappe.msgprint(len(contact_data))
            
            sales_team = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT sales_person, team_name,account_manager FROM `tabCustomer` WHERE  customer_name='{doc.customer_name}'  ;""")
            # frappe.msgprint(sales_team[0][0])
            # frappe.msgprint(sales_team[0][1])
            if renewal_option:
                # frappe.msgprint(renewal_option[0][0])
            
                if renewal_option[0][0] == "Yes":
                    
                    
                    data = frappe.get_doc({
                        'doctype': 'Renewal List',
                        'product_name':d.item_name,
                        'status':"Draft",
                        'invoice_no':invoice_num,
                        'end_date':d.end_date,
                        'renewal_attachment':d.renewal_attachment,
                        'total_quantity':d.qty,
                        'total_amount':d.amount,
                        'start_date':d.start_date,
                        'customer_name':doc.customer,
                        'sales_user' : user,
                        'sales_team' : lead_name,
                        'renewal_owner':sales_team[0][2]
                        
                    })
                    
                    
                    # frappe.msgprint(d.item_code)
                    
                    data.append("items",{
                        'item_code' : d.item_code,
                        'qty': d.qty,
                        'start_date':d.start_date,
                        'end_date':d.end_date,
                        'rate':d.rate,
                        'new_add':d.newadd,
                        'amount':d.amount,
                        'uom':d.uom,
                        'description':d.description,
                        'item_name': d.item_name,
                        'item_group':d.item_group,
                        'brand':d.brand,
                        'invoice_no':invoice_num,
                        'conversion_factor':d.conversion_factor,
                        'managed_services':d.managed_services
                    })
                    
                    
                    if doc.contact_list:
                        for each in doc.contact_list:
                    
                            data.append("contact_list",{
                                'user_name' : each.user_name,
                                'mobile_no': each.mobile_no,
                                'email_id':each.email_id,
                                'designation':each.designation
                                
                            })
                    else:
                        frappe.throw("Please add contact details")
                            
                        
                        
                        # frappe.msgprint("contact-entered")
                    
                    # frappe.msgprint("re-entered")
                    
                   
                    
                    
                    data.insert() 
        
                    
else:
    for d in doc.items:
        if d.newadd == "New":
            name_field = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT name FROM `tabRenewal List` WHERE invoice_no='{doc.return_against}'  ;""",as_dict=0)
            renewal_option = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT renewal_option FROM `tabItem` WHERE  name='{d.item_code}'  ;""")
            if renewal_option[0][0] == "Yes":
                old_data = frappe.get_doc('Renewal List',name_field[0][0])
            
                old_data.status = "Void"
                old_data.save()
        if d.newadd == "Renewal":
            name_field = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT name FROM `tabRenewal List` WHERE invoice_no='{doc.return_against}'  ;""",as_dict=0)
            
            
            old_data = frappe.get_doc('Renewal List',name_field[0][0])
            
            old_data.status = "Void"
            old_data.save()
        if d.newadd == "Additional"   : 
            name_field = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT name FROM `tabRenewal Item` WHERE invoice_no='{doc.return_against}'  ;""",as_dict=0)
            
            
            old_data1 = frappe.get_doc('Renewal Item',name_field[0][0])
            
            old_data1.status = "Void"
            old_data1.save()  
            if d.renewal_id != " ":
                #frappe.msgprint(name_field[0][0])
                old_data = frappe.get_doc('Renewal List',d.renewal_id)
                # frappe.msgprint(old_data)
                old_data.status = "Active"
                old_data.total_amount = int(old_data.total_amount) + int(d.amount)
                old_data.total_quantity = int(old_data.total_quantity) + int(d.qty)
                
                old_data.append("items",{
                    'item_code' : d.item_code,
                    'qty': d.qty,
                    'start_date':d.start_date,
                    'end_date':d.end_date,
                    'rate':d.rate,
                    'new_add':d.newadd,
                    'amount':d.amount,
                    'uom':d.uom,
                    'cost_center':d.cost_center,
                    'description':d.description,
                    'item_name': d.item_name,
                    'item_group':d.item_group,
                    'brand':d.brand,
                    'invoice_no':doc.name,
                    'status':"Void",
                    'conversion_factor':d.conversion_factor
                })
                #old_data.insert()
                old_data.save()
            
            else:
                frappe.throw(f"Please check Renewal ID")

name: cof to renewal status
COF and Supplier Quote
script:
for d in doc.items:
    # frappe.msgprint("hello")
    
    quote_data = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT 
    top.sq_name as name ,top.status,
    (case when top.p_rate IS NOT NULL THEN top.p_rate
    else 0 END) as purchase_rate,
    (case when top.p_amount IS NOT NULL THEN top.p_amount
    else 0 END) as purchase_amount,
    top.supplier as supplier
    FROM `tabQuotation Item` tqi
    LEFT JOIN (SELECT toi.parent as opportunity,tpq.status as status,toi.name , toi.item_code as s_item_code ,
    tpq.name as sq_name, tpq.item_code as sq_item_code,
        toi.rate as s_rate , tpq.rate as p_rate ,tpq.qty as p_qty, 
        tpq.amount as p_amount, tpq.supplier as supplier
        from 
        `tabOpportunity Item` toi
        left join (SELECT tsq.name as name ,tsq.status as status, 
        tsq.Supplier as supplier , tsqi.item_code as item_code ,
        tsqi.rate as rate , tsqi.qty as qty, tsqi.amount as amount, tsq.opportunity as opportunity
        from `tabSupplier Quotation` tsq  
        left join (SELECT parent , item_code , rate, qty, amount   
        FROM `tabSupplier Quotation Item`  WHERE recommended_ =1
        ) as tsqi on tsqi.parent = tsq.name 
        ) as tpq on tpq.opportunity = toi.parent and toi.item_code = tpq.item_code and toi.qty = tpq.qty
        ) as top on top.opportunity = tqi.prevdoc_docname and top.s_item_code = tqi.item_code and top.p_qty = tqi.qty
    WHERE tqi.parent = '{doc.quotation_id}' and tqi.item_code= '{d.item_code}' and tqi.qty ='{d.qty}' ;""",as_dict =1 )
    
   #to get orc amount
    orc_data = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT torc.commission_amount as orc_amount,
            torc.orc_id as orc, toi.orc as orc_value
            FROM `tabQuotation Item` tqi
            left join `tabOpportunity Item` toi on tqi.prevdoc_docname = toi.parent and tqi.qty = toi.qty  and toi.rate = tqi.rate and tqi.description = toi.description
			LEFT JOIN 
				(SELECT toi2.commission_amount as commission_amount, tol.name as orc_id,
				tol.opportunity_id as opportunity_id,
				toi2.item_code as item_code , toi2.qty as qty ,
				toi2.rate as rate , toi2.description as description 
				FROM `tabORC Item` toi2 
			    left join `tabORC List` tol on toi2.parent = tol.name	WHERE tol.docstatus  in(0, 1) and tol.workflow_state not in ('Duplicate','Cancelled') and tol.status != "Duplicate"
			    ) as torc on  torc.opportunity_id = toi.parent and toi.item_code = torc.item_code 
				and toi.qty = torc.qty and toi.rate = torc.rate and toi.description = torc.description
			WHERE tqi.parent = '{doc.quotation_id}' and tqi.item_code= '{d.item_code}' and tqi.qty ='{d.qty}' ;""",as_dict =1	
			)
    
    
    old_data = frappe.get_doc('Customer Order Form Item',d.name)
    old_data.purchase_rate = quote_data[0].purchase_rate
    old_data.purchase_amount = quote_data[0].purchase_amount
    old_data.supplier_quotation = quote_data[0].name
    old_data.supplier = quote_data[0].supplier
    # old_data.margin_amount = round(float(d.amount) - float(quote_data[0].purchase_amount),2)
    margin = 0
    
    if quote_data[0].name != " ":
        margin = margin +round(float(d.amount) - float(quote_data[0].purchase_amount),2) 
        current_datetime = frappe.utils.today()
        new_datetime = frappe.utils.add_to_date(current_datetime, days=10, as_string=True)
        
        sq_data = frappe.get_doc('Supplier Quotation',quote_data[0].name)
        sq_data.cof_id = doc.name
        sq_data.valid_till = new_datetime
        if sq_data.status == "Expired":
            sq_data.status = "Draft"
        sq_data.save()
    else:
        frappe.throw(f"Please check Supplier Quotation") 
    
    if orc_data[0].orc_value == 1 and orc_data[0].orc != " ":
        # frappe.msgprint("ORC")
        margin = margin - round(float(orc_data[0].orc_amount),2)
        old_data.orc = 1
        old_data.orc_id = orc_data[0].orc
        old_data.orc_amount = orc_data[0].orc_amount
        # frappe.msgprint(orc_data[0].orc)
        
        orc_list = frappe.get_doc('ORC List',orc_data[0].orc)
        orc_list.cof_id = doc.name
        # orc_list.valid_till = new_datetime
        # orc_list.status = "Draft"
        orc_list.save()
    elif orc_data[0].orc_value == 1 and orc_data[0].orc == " ": 
        frappe.throw(f"Please Create the ORC")
    old_data.margin_amount = margin    
    
        
    
    old_data.save()

name: ORC Margin Details
script:
# doc.set("custom_orc_margin_table", [])
for each in doc.items:
    
    p_data = frappe.db.sql(f"""
        SELECT (case when tpq.rate IS NOT NULL THEN tpq.rate
        else 0 END) as purchase_rate,
        (case when tpq.amount IS NOT NULL THEN tpq.amount
        else 0 END) as purchase_amount
        from 
        `tabOpportunity Item` toi
        left join (SELECT tsq.name as name  , tsqi.item_code as item_code , tsqi.rate as rate,tsqi.amount as amount ,
        tsq.opportunity as opportunity, tsq.description as description
        from `tabSupplier Quotation` tsq  
        left join (SELECT parent , item_code , rate, amount,description  FROM `tabSupplier Quotation Item`  WHERE recommended_ =1) as tsqi on tsqi.parent = tsq.name 
        ) as tpq on tpq.opportunity = toi.parent and toi.item_code = tpq.item_code and tpq.description = toi.description
        WHERE toi.parent = '{doc.opportunity_id}' and toi.item_code= '{each.item_code}' and toi.rate= '{each.rate}' and toi.qty ='{each.qty}' ;""",as_dict =1)
    
    # frappe.msgprint(float(each.amount) - float(p_data[0].purchase_amount))
    old_data = frappe.get_doc('ORC Item',each.name)
    old_data.purchase_rate = p_data[0].purchase_rate
    old_data.purchase_amount = p_data[0].purchase_amount
    old_data.margin = float(each.amount) - float(p_data[0].purchase_amount)
    # old_data.margin_amount = float(each.amount) 
    
    old_data.save()
